fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • A headline gave the correct dollar figure for a fall in Peloton’s stock-market valuation (Exercise bike firm loses $1.5bn in value over ‘dystopian, sexist’ advert, 5 December, page 3). But a text reference slipped up in giving the sum as £1.5bn. • Other recently corrected articles include: Singer Katherine Jenkins mugged after going to help woman California woman punched mountain lion in effort to save her dog Britain has closed almost 800 libraries since 2010, figures show
